title: 50 Kg Of Sour Cherries (۵۰ کیلو آلبالو)in Canada

sources.title: 50KgOfSourCherriesinCanada
sources.description: Synopsis When the corrupted groom starts shooting in the wedding ceremony, guests try to run away. Aida and Davoud accidentally end up in a car that crashes a police car. Aida lies to the inspector that Davoud is her husband and that's where the story begins. Cast: Farhad Aeesh, Mona Ahmadi, Siamak Ansari, Dariush Asadzade, Vishka Asayesh, Behnoosh Bakhtiari, Afsaneh Bayegan, Mehran Ghafoorian, Mani Haghighi, Pejman Jamshidi, Hasti Mahdavifar, Omid Roohani, Ali Sadeghi, Azadeh Samadi, Sorush Sehhat After the film was released in March 2016 with 13 billion Tomans gross it became the third highest grossing film of the year in Iran. But it's screening was banned in other regions of Iran due to what considered by the authorities as inappropriate content.
